name: Squire! Where's my sword?!
description:
The famous and great Sir Münchausen is embarking on yet another epic quest to save the world from evil.

And as his squire, you get to carry his stuff!

Good for you!

Created by
Kalle-Eemeli "Magnega" Paananen
Ruska "Myrrsmiesi" Sarapisto
Robert "Projab" Raulus
Arsi "Hakita" Patala
